meta.title: Jynx | About Us

about.title: About Jynx
about.subtitle: Transforming gaming from solo to social

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2024, Jynx was born from a simple yet powerful vision: to transform how gamers connect and play together. We understand the frustration of wasting precious gaming time searching for compatible teammates or struggling to find players who match your skill level and gaming style.
story.p2: Our platform serves as the bridge between solo gaming experiences and fulfilling team play, allowing you to quickly find your perfect gaming companions based on skill level, playing style, and personality.

problem.title: The Problem We're Solving
problem.intro: As gamers ourselves, we've experienced the challenges firsthand:

points.time: Spending more time searching for teammates than actually playing
points.mismatch: Getting matched with players whose skills or goals don't align with yours
points.disconnected: Feeling disconnected from the broader gaming community
points.relationships: Struggling to build lasting gaming relationships

problem.conclusion: Jynx addresses these pain points with innovative matchmaking systems designed specifically for gamers, by gamers.

arthur.name: Arthur Bonvallet
arthur.bio: A passionate gamer and experienced product specialist from Paris, Arthur brings his deep understanding of user experience and product development to Jynx. His vision drives our platform's intuitive design and feature set.

antoine.name: Antoine Haie
antoine.bio: Antoine's technical expertise as a fullstack developer powers the Jynx platform. Based in Paris, his gaming background combined with his technical skills ensures our platform delivers a seamless experience for gamers of all levels.

elo.title: ELO-Based Match Queue
elo.description: Our sophisticated matching algorithm considers your skill level (ELO) to connect you with teammates and opponents who provide the right level of challenge and compatibility.

chat.title: Global Chat System
chat.description: Stay connected with the broader gaming community through our vibrant global chat system, where you can discuss strategies, share experiences, or simply hang out with fellow gamers.

guilds.title: Guild-Based Communities
guilds.description: Find your gaming home with our unique "guild" system. Join existing communities based on your favorite games or playing styles, or create your own guild and become a community leader. Build your reputation, establish your team culture, and grow your network of gaming allies.

for_everyone.title: For Every Gamer
for_everyone.p1: Whether you're a casual player looking for fun companions or a competitive gamer seeking serious teammates for tournament play, Jynx welcomes all. Our platform supports communities across all game types, genres, and platforms.
for_everyone.p2: Don't see a community for your favorite game? Create one and become its founding leader! At Jynx, we believe in empowering gamers to build and nurture their own spaces.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Jynx is more than just a platformâ€”it's a growing community of gamers who believe that gaming is better together. We're just getting started, and we invite you to be part of our journey as we revolutionize how gamers connect, compete, and collaborate.

cta.title: Join the Jynx Community
cta.description: Be the first to experience a new way of finding your perfect gaming squad

meta.title: Jynx | Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn how Jynx protects your privacy and handles your data. Our transparent privacy policy outlines our practices and your rights.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: Welcome to Jynx. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website/application and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

information.title: The Data We Collect
information.p1: We collect and process the following data:

personal.email: Email Addresses: We collect your email address when you provide it through our application.

use.title: How We Use Your Data
use.p1: We use your email address for the following purposes:
use.notifications: To send you notifications about activity on the platform
use.feedback: To collect feedback about your experience with Jynx
use.newsletters: To send newsletters and updates about our services

sharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.p1: We do not share your email address with any third parties except as required by law.

security.title: Data Security
security.p1: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.p1: We will retain your email address for as long as legally permitted under French law, or until you request its deletion.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.access: Request access to your personal data
rights.rectification: Request correction of your personal data
rights.deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.objection: Object to processing of your personal data
rights.restriction: Request restriction of processing your personal data
rights.portability: Request transfer of your personal data
rights.p2: If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us by email.

deletion.title: Data Deletion Requests
deletion.p1: If you would like to have your data deleted from our systems, please send an email to privacy@jynx.app with the subject line "Data Deletion Request" and include the email address you used to register with Jynx.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.none: We do not use cookies on our platform.
cookies.analytics: We use Google Analytics to collect anonymous information about how visitors use our website. Google Analytics uses technologies that do not identify you personally. The information generated is transmitted to and stored by Google on servers that may be located outside your country of residence.

international.title: International Transfers
international.p1: As Jynx operates worldwide, your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than the one in which you reside. These countries may have data protection laws that are different from those in your country.

age.title: Age Restrictions
age.p1: Jynx is a social media platform (similar to Tinder and Discord) and is intended for users who are 13 years or older. We do not knowingly collect data from anyone under this age.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.p1: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and sending you an email notification.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.p1: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
